column4: Hi, just installed Ubuntu on a different partition from where I had a Fedora installation, now the grub only recognize the Ubuntu partition. What can I do?
boot into Ubuntu, mount your fedora partition, take a look at the menu.lst from fedora and copy the entry to your ubuntu menu.lst
any idea on my problem? ps.: i dont have an awai card
sebsebseb thanks I will try to edit the /boot/grub/menu.lst and I have not any Windows install here ;-)
